衵字的基本解释

衵
rì
贴身的内衣。

衵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rì］
［《廣韻》人質切，入質，日。］
(1)内衣；贴身衣。
(2)谓贴身穿上。

衵字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　衵； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1112第24
【唐韻】【正韻】人質切【集韻】【韻會】入質切，?音日。【說文】日日所常衣也。　又【集韻】尼質切，音昵。【玉篇】女人近身衣也。【左傳·宣九年】皆衷其衵服，以戲于朝。

衵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
衵字的起名意思

暂无。

衵
Basic explanation of words
衵
rì
Close-fitting underwear.
衵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rì］
["Guangyun" hostage cut, enter the hostage, day. ]
(1) Underwear; underwear.
(2) It is said to be worn next to the body.
衵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Clothes Word Department] 　衵; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1112 Page 24
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] The hostages are cut [Ji Yun] [The Yunhui] The hostages are cut, and the sound day. 【Said the text】I wear clothes every day.　[Jiyun] Nishi cut, sound. [Jade articles] Women's close-fitting clothes are also. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Nine Years] They all sincerely serve their ancestors and play in the dynasty.
